Plot: Elisabeth leaves her abusive and drunken husband Rolf, she packs her bags, takes the kids and goes to her brother Göran. The year is 1975 and Göran lives in a commune called Together. ...
Title: Together
Actors: Lisa Lindgren, Michael Nyqvist, Emma Samuelsson, Sam Kessel
tomatoConsensus: Managing to be both satirical and warm-hearted in its look at the inhabitants of a commune, Together successfully captures the spirit of a time.
